item.title: Knuth shuffle
item.description: A classic algorithm for shuffling the elements of an array in linear time. struct Random { static func uniform(range: Range<Int>) -> Int { let lower = UInt32(range.lowerBound) let upper = UInt32(range.upperBound) let random = (arc4random_uniform(upper - lower) + lower) return Int(random) } } func shuffle<T>(array: inout [T]) { let n = array.count for i in 0..<n { let j = Random.uniform(range: i..<n) let item = array[j] array[j] = array[i] array[i] = item } }
